title: Emergency Medical Services Statewide Treatment Protocols
description: The Statewide Treatment Protocols are the standard of EMS patient care in Massachusetts.
cleaned_text: 2023.1 Statewide Treatment Protocols (DOCX)](https://www.mass.gov/doc/memo-and-change-chart-20231-statewide-treatment-protocols-docx/download)(English, DOCX 45.87 KB) - This page, Emergency Medical Services Statewide Treatment Protocols, is offered by - [Office of Emergency Medical Services](/orgs/office-of-emergency-medical-services) - - [Bureau of Health Care Safety and Quality](/orgs/bureau-of-health-care-safety-and-quality) - [Department of Public Health](/orgs/department-of-public-health) Emergency Medical Services Statewide Treatment Protocols The Statewide Treatment Protocols are the standard of EMS patient care in Massachusetts.
